meanings.definition: To surpass in speed or achievement.
meanings.sent1: The cheetah was outstripping all the other animals in the race.
meanings.sent2: The athlete trained hard to ensure he was outstripping his previous records.
meanings.sent3: The tortoise joked that he was outstripping the hare in the race.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was outstripping her doubts as she neared the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The rocket outstripped all expectations as it soared into the sky.

meanings.definition: To leave behind in a race or competition.
meanings.sent1: The hare was outstripping the tortoise in the race.
meanings.sent2: The car's speed was outstripping the other vehicles on the highway.
meanings.sent3: The snail chuckled as it was outstripping the turtle in the slow race.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was outstripping her competitors as she surged ahead.
meanings.sent5: The champion outstripped all opponents with ease in the final lap.
